title: What has GD become?
body:
So I used to be deep with the old GD family back in the forums (before it became boards) and I left ever since the boards came out. I only recently found out that there was a GD section and after the 'removal' of the huge Oceanic LoL FB Group I'm probably gonna dwell back here.

So basically I haven't been here for a while.

What is GD nowadays? Is there a family like there was before? Is there any particular personalities I should know about?
